WorkItem.ClosedComment: User requested advice, khanthal provided a solution that will work for user
WorkItem.Description:
I don't believe this to be a problem with rawr at all. I think this has to do with how im configuring rawr for bear tanking. I can't seem to get rawr to recommend dodge at all. All the bear tanks i see are reforging dodge like it was crack cocaine. Anyone see what im doing wrong here?
Â 
*Only posting this here because it allows me to attach my config*

Comments.Message: Sorry, original attachment had "Crazy about threat" enabled

If you turn threat value to "none" you will see it want to reforge dodge.  You also should probably set your target damage (raw) to Normal T11 raids.

This is personally how I have it set and I have far more threat than I want at times...the other tank in my 10m can't keep things off me if I keep attacking after he taunts.  I have to just kinda stand there.
